member.name: T:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of methods for string manipulation

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string's bytes to hashed data and turns them into a hexadecimal representation of its characters
member.param: The string that will be converted
member.returns: The hexadecimal representation of the input's characters

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a boolean value
member.param: The string that will be converted (ex. "true", "false", "yes", "no", "1", "0", "да", "не")
member.returns: A boolean value representing the strings meaning

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a numeric value of type 'short'
member.param: The string that will be converted
member.returns: A numeric value representing the strings meaning

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into an integer numeric value
member.param: The string that will be converted
member.returns: A numeric value representing the strings meaning

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a numeric value of type 'long'
member.param: The string that will be converted
member.returns: A numeric value representing the strings meaning

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a DateTime value
member.param: The string that will be converted
member.returns: A DateTime value representing the strings meaning

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of a string
member.param: The string that will be processed
member.returns: The inputted string with its first character capitalized

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Processes a string and gives back a substring between specified starting and ending substrings
member.param: The string that will be processed
The substring after which the substring should be gotten
The substring before which the substring should be gotten
The index in the inputted string from which the method should start
member.returns: A string between the values of startString and endString

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string written in cyrillic to latin letters
member.param: The string in cyrillic to be processed
member.returns: A string representation of the inputted string in latin letters

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string written in latin to cyrillic letters
member.param: The string in latin to be processed
member.returns: A string representation of the inputted string in cyrillic letters

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a username to a valid string by converting it's letters to latin if there are cyrillic ones
member.param: Username to be processed

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a filename to a valid string by converting it's letters to latin if there are cyrillic ones
member.param: Filename to be processed

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters of a string
member.param: String from which the characters should be gotten
Number of characters to get
member.returns: A substring of the first characters of a string

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension of a file if such exists
member.param: File whose extension is needed

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a files content type by its extension
member.param: The extension for which the content type is needed
member.returns: The content type for the file extension entered

member.name: M:Telerik.Ils.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to an array of its characters byte values
member.param: String to be converted
member.returns: An array of the byte values of the characters
